# Contributing to Frontend Stack Blueprint

Thank you for your interest in improving the Frontend Stack Blueprint!

## Types of Contributions

### üì¶ Propose an Addition

Want to add a new technology to the stack? Open an issue using the
[Propose Addition](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/propose-addition.md) template.

### üóëÔ∏è Propose a Removal

Think a technology should be removed? Open an issue using the
[Propose Removal](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/propose-removal.md) template.

### ‚¨ÜÔ∏è Propose a Version Upgrade

Want to bump a minimum version? Open an issue using the
[Propose Upgrade](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/propose-upgrade.md) template.

### üìù Documentation Fixes

For typos, clarity improvements, or broken links ‚Äî open a PR directly.

## Contribution Rules

1. **Evidence-based** ‚Äî All proposals must include data/reasoning
2. **Production-proven** ‚Äî Only propose tech with production track record
3. **Ecosystem fit** ‚Äî Technology must work with the existing stack
4. **AI-friendly** ‚Äî Sufficient LLM training data for quality code generation
5. **One change per PR** ‚Äî Keep changes focused and reviewable

## Versioning Impact

| Change Type                  | Version Bump |
| ---------------------------- | ------------ |
| New technology in stack      | MINOR        |
| Remove technology from stack | MAJOR        |
| New deployment target        | MINOR        |
| Minimum version bump         | PATCH        |
| Documentation fix            | PATCH        |
| New architectural principle  | MAJOR        |

## Code of Conduct

Be respectful. Focus on technical merit. This is a collaborative project.
